author: Alana Mastrangelo, Alana Mastrangelo
title: U. of Oregon Furloughs Hundreds of Employees
description: The University of Oregon has announced that hundreds of its employees will be furloughed due to revenue restrictions over the Chinese virus pandemic.
content:
The University of Oregon has announced that hundreds of its employees will be furloughed due to revenue restrictions over the Chinese virus pandemic.
University of Oregon President Michael H. Schill recently announced that 282 employees will be furloughed in… [+2649 chars]
